name: WiFiNINA_Generic
keywords: wifi, wi-fi, WiFiNINA, NINA-B302-ublox, W101, W102, shield, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD, STM32, nRF52, Credentials, Manager
description: Enables network connection (local and Internet) and WiFiStorage for SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, Teensy, AVR Mega, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, nRF52, NINA_B302_ublox, NINA_B112_ublox, etc. in addition to Arduino MKR WiFi 1010, Arduino MKR VIDOR 4000, Arduino UNO WiFi Rev.2, Nano 33 IoT
